fields.ctiaction: action to be performed after calculating test time (int)
fields.ctientity: the entity that the definition refers to (tinyint)
fields.ctifrom: from what test stage to be calculated by TestTimer (smallint)
fields.ctiperformsite: cti can be define per performing site (int)
fields.ctiresult: REMOVED FROM CODE IN CL# 104306 IMA# 262001 (nvarchar)
fields.ctistrkey: REMOVED FROM CODE IN CL# 104307 IMA# 232001 (nvarchar)
fields.ctito: until what test stage to be calculated by TestTimer (smallint)

Indexes.INDEX1_UNQ_CTI: nonclustered, unique located on PRIMARY (cticode, ctiurglevel, ctitype, ctifrom, ctito, ctiperformsite)
